ValidationRule.description: Rule to validate the change to project, opportunity or account of the resource request populated with a resource request set.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (NOT( ISBLANK(pse__Resource_Request_Set__c)), ( OR( ISCHANGED( pse__Account__c ), ISCHANGED( pse__Opportunity__c ) , ISCHANGED( pse__Project__c ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the project, opportunity and account of a resource request that belongs to a resource request set.
